source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola is ready to press on westward to the Dravanian hinterlands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_00<tab>テイルフェザーのヤ・シュトラは、先に進みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_01<tab>The Dravanian hinterlands lie west of Tailfeather, and getting there requires that you travel through Gnath-held territory. Proceed with caution as you continue on your way to Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_01<tab>ヤ・シュトラから出発を促された。目指す「低地ドラヴァニア」は、グナース族の勢力圏を西に抜け、さらに山道を下って抜けた先にあるらしい。「低地ドラヴァニア」へ向かおう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_02<tab>You have arrived in the Dravanian hinterlands. According to Y'shtola, Matoya dwells on the other side of the Thaliak River. Look for a place to cross to the opposite bank.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_02<tab>低地ドラヴァニアに到着した。サリャク河を渡るルートを探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_03<tab>As you make your way through the ruins of Sharlayan, you encounter a band of goblins. The confrontation threatens to turn violent, but Alphinaud manages to defuse the situation by convincing the goblin leader, Slowfix, that your purpose is peaceful. In an abrupt change of tone, Slowfix offers to take you on a tour. Follow the goblin to the heart of the settlement and speak with him there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_03<tab>廃墟となったシャーレアンを進んでいると、スローフィクスと名乗るゴブリンに率いられた一団に取り囲まれた。ひとまず、彼らと話し合うことになった。イディルシャイアの「スローフィクス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_04<tab>You learn that the goblins mean to found a new nation here in Sharlayan, aided by treasure hunters who have come seeking the city's artifacts. In exchange for passage through the settlement, Slowfix asks that you help the denizens of Idyllshire with the myriad problems they face. For want of an alternate way to cross the Thaliak River, you decide to oblige the goblin.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SEQ_04<tab>スローフィクスたちは、廃都を自分たちの街として再生しようとしていた。彼らに協力すれば、イディルシャイアの利用を認め、サリャク河を渡るのにも協力してくれるらしい。急がば回れ……スローフィクスに協力するしかないようだ。
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_TODO_00<tab>低地ドラヴァニアに向かう

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_TODO_01<tab>Find a place to cross the Thaliak River.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_TODO_01<tab>サリャク河を渡るルートを探す

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>I believe I am sufficiently rested. Let us continue west to Sharlayan.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>休憩もとれたことだし、旅路を急ぎましょう。
廃都「シャーレアン」へ行くには、
ここから、さらに西へと進む必要があるわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>Once we descend the mountain path, we will arrive at the Dravanian hinterlands. From there, it is but a short distance to the city.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>現地の蛮族……グナース族の勢力圏を抜ける形になる。
ドラゴン族の攻撃にも警戒しながら、素早く通過しましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_002<tab>Be warned that we shall be passing through Gnath territory. We must needs be wary of them and the dragons both.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_002<tab>西の山道を下って抜けると、目指す「低地ドラヴァニア」よ。
さあ、気を引き締めて行きましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>When last we set foot here, Estinien and Ysayle were with us. Though it was not all that long ago, I find myself strangely taken by nostalgia.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>以前、ここを訪れたときは、
君に加えて、イゼルとエスティニアン殿がいた。
少し前のことなのに、懐かしくすら感じるよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>Matoya dwells on the far side of the Thaliak River. Let us search for a crossing.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>「マトーヤ」が住んでいるのは、
低地ドラヴァニアを貫く大河、「サリャク河」の向こう岸よ。
まずは、河を渡るルートを探しましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>The bridge ahead is collapsed; I am afraid we shan't be crossing there. But worry not, I know another way.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>この先の橋が、物の見事に崩落しているわ……。
仕方がない、回り道をしましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>See you the towering structure to the north? We should be able to cross there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>北側に、大きな石板のようなものがあるのはわかるわね？
あちら側を通れば、河を渡れるはずよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>But fifteen years abandoned, and already Sharlayan has fallen into such disarray... Verily, a city is no more than its inhabitants.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>住民が去って15年で、これほど崩壊が進んでいるとは……。
都市とは住人あってのもの、ということか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>“Knowledge Seeks No Man”... So says the motto of Sharlayan engraved upon yonder stone. The meaning is simple: it falls to us to seek enlightenment.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>「知識は人を求めず」……。
この石碑に刻まれた、シャーレアンのモットーよ。
知識とは、人が自ら求めなければ得られぬものという意味ね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>During the Sixth Astral Era, at the turn of the thirteenth century, men from the northern nation of Sharlayan journeyed across the seas to Eorzea in search of knowledge.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>第六星暦1300年代初頭……
北洋諸島の学術都市「シャーレアン」の学士たちが、
エオルゼアの知識を集めんとして、この地にやって来た。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>Upon arriving at these shores, they established a camp for their scholarly endeavors. Over time, this camp grew into a settlement, and the settlement prospered, and so much so that it came to be counted amongst Eorzea's great city<var 1F /var>states.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>彼らが築いた学術調査のための観測基地には、
いつしか多くの人が集まり、植民都市として発展したわ。
エオルゼア六大都市に数えられるほどにね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>Alas, those glory days are now but a fading memory. With her keepers lost to her, Sharlayan has become an empty husk of her former self.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>それが15年前の「大撤収」以来、無人の廃墟と化し、
今や訪れる者もいないというわけ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_024<tab>(-???-)Pshkohhh... Uplander is mistaken. Sharlayan has new keepers, is on cusp of new age of glory!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_024<tab>(-？？？？-)シュコォ……シュコォ……
ところが　どっこい　大誤解！
無人どころか　ヒトいっぱい！　ゴブリン　ゴブゴブ　大所帯！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_026<tab>(-Well-spoken Goblin-)<gasp> Uplander is mistaken muchly! We are not thieves! This place is our home!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_026<tab>(-謎のゴブリン族-)これまた　すっごい　大誤解！
盗人　盗賊　大嫌い！　この地は　我らの土地だゴブ！
我らの新たな国となる　大事な大事な　土地だゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_027<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Your<var 1A 01 /var> home? When last I looked, it was mine and Alphinaud's. We were <var 1A 02 /var>born<var 1A 01 /var> here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_027<tab>あら、それは少し違うのではないかしら。
私とアルフィノ様は、ここシャーレアンの出身なんだけれど？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_028<tab>(-Well-spoken Goblin-)Pssshmph! When uplanders abandoned city, uplanders gave up claim. Born here or no, uplanders are trespassers!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_028<tab>(-謎のゴブリン族-)侵入してるの　お前さん！
不法侵入　許さんゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>My friends, please. We did not come to dispute your claim to this land. Our purpose here is peaceful: we desire but to cross the river.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>……話がややこしくなってきたぞ。
ともかく私たちは、領有権を主張しに来た訳ではない。
河を渡るために、ここを通り抜けたいだけなんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Be calm, I beg you, and let us speak like the civilized folk that we are. Surely we can come to a mutual understanding.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>無益な争いをして、被害を出すよりも、
話し合ってお互いに協力すべきだと思うが……。
……いかがかな？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_031<tab>Pssshkoh... If that is truth, then uplanders are welcome here. Come with Slowfix─Slowfix will show uplanders settlement.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_031<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
敵対しないの本当か？　それなら　しっかり対話ゴブ！
「スローフィクス」と話すゴブ！　我らの街に　ご案内～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_040<tab>Pshkohhh... Here is heart of settlement, name of Idyllshire!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_040<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
ここは　「イディルシャイア」！
我らが誇る　新たな街ゴブ！
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_041<tab>よぉ、スローフィクス、また新入りかい？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>Greetings to you. I am Alphinaud Leveilleur, and may I introduce my companions, <var 29 EB02 /var> and Y'shtola. We have journeyed far in search of a friend, and seek to cross the river.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>私の名は、アルフィノ・ルヴェユール。
そして、こちらが<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>とヤ・シュトラ。
旅の途中で、サリャク河を渡ろうとしていたんだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_043<tab>But findin' the main bridge collapsed, you went lookin' for a detour, and ended up stumblin' into Slowfix and his crew. Is that right?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_043<tab>ははぁん、迂回しようと思って、こっちに来たってわけかい。
そこを、スローフィクスたちゴブリン族の連中に、
取っ捕まったと……災難だったね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_044<tab>That is the short of it, aye. This place, Idyllshire─I came expecting a ghost town; suffice it to say I am surprised to find it so alive.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_044<tab>「イディルシャイア」と言ったかしら。
こんな集落ができていたことを知らなかったから、
少しばかり驚いたわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_045<tab>Well, with all them precious artifacts lyin' about, 'twas only a matter of time afore treasure hunters like me moved in. But we weren't the first to arrive, neither. By then, Slowfix and his gobbie friends were already settled.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_045<tab>ああ、アタシたちはトレジャーハンターでね。
廃都に残された有用な品を求めて、海沿いにやって来たんだ。
そこで、こいつらと出会ったのさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_046<tab>At first, gobbies and hunters disliked each other. But understanding came, then friendship. Now gobbies and hunters have joined hands to build great new nation!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_046<tab>最初は　バチバチ　対立したゴブ。
それでも　今では　仲間ゴブ！
力を合わせて　街作り！　みんなで　新たな国作り！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_047<tab>So that is what happened after we Sharlayans departed...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_047<tab>ようやく話が見えてきたわ。
私たち、シャーレアン人が去ったこの都を、
自分たちの新しい街として、再生しようとしているのね？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_048<tab>Oh, so you're locals...? Um, no hard feelin's, I hope? All these nice buildings, but no one to live in 'em─felt like a waste, you know?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_048<tab>……ほう、アンタたちはシャーレアン人なのかい。
まぁ、簡単に言えば、そういうことだな。
使える建物は多いし、気候も環境も住むのに悪くない。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_049<tab>We've been tryin' to put the place to rights, and things've been goin' well for the most part, but it ain't all smooth sailin'. Not to sound ungrateful, but the traps your people left lyin' about are a <var 1A 02 /var>bloody<var 1A 01 /var> nuisance. And there's the Illuminati harryin' us day and night...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_049<tab>ただし、万事上手くいってるわけじゃなくてね。
「青の手」っていうゴブリン族集団との対立が絶えないし、
シャーレアン人が遺した魔法仕掛けの罠にも手を焼いている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_050<tab>Pshkohhh, Slowfix has bright idea! Uplanders desire mutual understanding, yes? Best way to understanding is helping one another! Help citizens of Idyllshire, and uplanders can be citizens too! Citizens are free to cross river!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_SLOWFIX_000_050<tab>もしも　問題解決に　力を貸してくれるなら
ここを自由に　使っていいゴブ。
河を渡るのも　協力するゴブ？　これは　破格の条件ゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>Well, I am not aware of a quicker way to reach our destination. Let us assist Slowfix and his people.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_051<tab>まいったな……先を急ぐ旅なのだが……。
……仕方あるまい、取引成立ということにしておこうか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>From the goblins' perspective, such a well-appointed city is certainly an attractive proposition.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_ALPHINAUD_000_052<tab>確かに、ここには利用できるものが多そうだが……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_052<tab>I suppose it's only to be expected that others would come and occupy Sharlayan. Nonetheless, it feels akin to having strangers take over your home in your absence.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA606_01655_YSHTOLA_000_052<tab>まさか、廃都「シャーレアン」に、
住んでいる人たちがいたなんて……。
